summary: An environmental mod I tweaked for Helgen torture chamber
descriptionHtml:
I find the torture chamber at helgen plain and awful. Its a torture chamber, so there should be dead bodies and others still alive and locked up and it shouldnt be so clean and tidy. Anyways I know you guys have played through that escape scene many times, so if you want to see how a torture chamber should look like (in my opinion) try this mod then

Note - 
If you used a nude mod, then the girls will show up naked, otherwise they will appear in their undies for the vanilla game. By the way, there\'s no real children in this mod, they are just my tweaks on a normal female to look more like children and that\'s about it.
author: simplesim
